entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How can I run my Maui projects with the Maui source code fully open to me in Visual Studio so I can test/solve bugs I find in the Maui code? #18270
  • CollectionView is rendered too tall #18269
  • Can't run unit tests with MAUI and net7.0-windows10.0.19041.0 #18268
  • Button.BorderColor not working on some platforms #18261
  • .NET 8: Not sure that the com.apple.security.get-task-allow entitlement in templates for MacCat is required #18259
  • .NET Maui Secondary ToolbarItem Issue on Windows #18258
    Backlog
  • IllegalArgumentException .NET MAUI 8 RC 2 #18251
  • [WinUI MAUI8] Mouse wheel is not working #18250
    Backlog
  • Maui Overdraws in Android even with completely blank or default project, also overdraws with empty Borders and BoxViews, hurting frame rates and performance targets #18245
  • .NET 8: Mac Cat app with WebView not inspectable in Safari Dev Tools #18243
    Backlog
  • Button ImageSource not Scaling as expected. #18242
    Backlog
  • [MAUI][.NET7] Place the cursor in the middle of the editor and the cursor will always move to the end for D10 page #18241
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Mac][.NET7] There is no dotnet bot image in the title bar of the G8 page #18239
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] [.NET 8 RC2] FlyoutItem Backgroundcolor Is not fully displaying #18238
    Backlog
  • Adding custom button to .NET MAUI Shell Tabs #18237
  • Software keyboard hides entry box #18236
    .NET 8 GA

Closed

  • .NET MAUI Blazor project template misses out on the MAUI Blazor package reference #17721
  • Unwanted behavior in ToolBarItems on iOS and macOS. #12359
    Backlog
  • [MacCatalyst] Image not respecting parent size #10481
    Backlog
  • iOS: Image layout problem - can spill out into surrounding UI #14926
    Backlog
  • Images do not layout correctly in iOS #13893
  • Unable to show images in a collection view due to layout issues #14606
    Backlog
  • [iOS]Image downscaling makes image layout inconsistent on IOS when compared to Android and non downscaled images #16921
    Backlog
  • In .Net MAUI a container is wrong resized on iOS, when an image with AspectFit is inside #14139
    Backlog
  • Downsizing Image with AspectFit leaves space around Image on iOS #16120
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] Build error in .NET 8 RC1 - "XamlC error XFC0126: Resources in ResourceDictionary require a x:Key attribute" for resources that have a key #17461
    .NET 8 GA
  • Desenvolvimento MAUI error #18044
  • Label FormattedString not reacting to AppThemeBinding change at runtime #17938
    .NET 8 GA
  • [MAUI][.NET7] Clicking on the C2 page will hang #18240

PullRequests

Created

  • [Templates] Remove get-task-allow entitlement from Templates #18272
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI
  • Merge `net8.0` into `main` #18271
  • [core] fix memory leak with `CarouselView` & `INotifyCollectionChanged` #18267
    memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Allow iOS Keyboard Scrolling to be turned off in Lifecycle Events #18266
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA

Merged

  • [net8.0] Add NuGet package information #18197
    .NET 8 GA
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] Add a test for #17776 "Calling SetBinding after setting a constant value crashes" #18264
    .NET 8 GA
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] [X] revert #5611 #18262
    .NET 8 GA
  • [net8.0] Update net8 rtm versions #18247
    .NET 8 GA
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] Rework the Label mappers for FormattedText #18263
    .NET 8 GA
  • Add a test for #17776 "Calling SetBinding after setting a constant value crashes" #17796
    area/Xaml </>, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, .NET 8 GA
  • Rework the Label mappers for FormattedText #18105
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 8 GA
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] Bump net7 #18244
    .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] Update aspnet versions #18215

Updated

  • Setup legacy mappers #18087
    .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] Fix iOS tests net7 #18163
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Templates] Fix template typo #18166
    area/templates 📄
  • Added orientation property to slider #18057
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 9 Planning
  • [Android] Fix Border clipping issues #18134
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1
  • Fixed null coalesce issues #17920
    s/pr-needs-author-input
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling Improvements and UITests (not from fork) #17670
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, stale, area/keyboard, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix shadow scaling issue #17902
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, Under Consideration
  • Invalidate Shapes BackgroundColor #18183
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, .NET 8 SR1
  • [net8.0] Move tests to use iOS17 and Android 33 #18214
    .NET 8 GA
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area/layout 🔲, .NET 8 SR2
